item.title: How to fix ORA-00932 error when calling QuerySet.bulk_update on a TextField
item.description: Intro Django’s bulk_update QuerySet method allows you to update multiple objects in a single SQL UPDATE statement. I recently ran into an issue calling bulk_update against an Oracle database, and in this post, I will share the solution I used to fix it. The Oracle error that we’ll be fixing is this: ORA-00932: inconsistent datatypes: expected CHAR got CLOB Background First, let’s start with an example Django model Throwaway with a single TextField named my_field:
